description:
From its chunky, industrial handle to its BlackWashed D2 tool steel blade, this full-sized folder isn't afraid of a little hard work. With its metal construction and high-end finishes, the Cannonball is a tough knife that’s at home on the job site or the campsite.

  • Tough D2 tool steel blade is highly wear resistant and takes a keen edge
  • BlackWash finish improves corrosion resistance of the high-carbon steel and hides wear well
  • Modified drop point blade excels at cutting tough material, like wood and cardboard
  • SpeedSafe® assisted opening mechanism and flipper tab makes deployment easy
  • Flipper tab doubles as a guard when the knife is open
  • Machined stainless steel handles have plenty of texturing to improve grip
  • Grey PVD (physical vapor deposition) super-strong finish on the handle
  • Jimping on the front and back of the handle and the spine of the blade, provides a sure grip
  • Frame lock design effectively gives a folding knife full tang rigidity
  • Deep-carry pocket clip is reversible and designed for tip-up carry
name: Kershaw Cannonball Knife - Unisex
